extendedInfo.description: iTunes for Windows required. Mac version also available in the Play Store.Want to stop carrying both your phone and your iPod? Keep your music fresh with smart playlists? iSyncr enables you to quickly sync your Android device with the music you have in iTunes using a simple to use interface. No need to move your music into a new music management software. iSyncr works directly with iTunes so you can sync hassle-free.Go beyond just music syncing with these additional features:â Work directly with your existing iTunes playlists and libraries for fast setupâ Sync with a cord over USB or sync wirelessly with a WiFi connectionâ Include album art with your music to enjoy on your phoneâ Sync your ratings between iTunes and your phone to keep your smart playlists up to dateâ Have a device with internal and external memory? Choose which drive each playlist syncs toâ Sync with multiple iTunes Librariesâ Create smart playlists on your phone using the Live Lists featureâ Sync your MP3 downloads on your phone back to your iTunes libraryâ Sync your video and podcasts for a complete iPod replacementâ Sync Android playlists back to your computerâ Automate wireless syncing of your music and videos on a scheduleCombine iSyncr with our free Rocket Player music player to take advantage of these additional features:â Sync new playlists and playlist changes back to iTunesâ Sync podcast bookmarks to and from iTunesâ iSyncr Live Lists dynamically update while playingLite Version Limitationsâ No play count syncingâ Only one playlist at a timeâ Only 100 items per playlistâ Upgrade from the lite version to iSyncr for PC to remove all limitationsNote: This app will not sync copy protected music or videos but will alert you to which songs will not play be synced to your device.Need help? Visit http://www.jrtstudio.com for quick tips or to contact support.For information on how to get started and to learn about more features and options for using iSyncr to sync your music visit www.jrtstudio.com.Want to help translate to your language?http://www.getlocalization.com/iSyncrÂ© 2012 JRT Studio LLC | iSyncr is a trademark of JRT Studio LLC | iTunes is a trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

reviews.title: Just added app
reviews.comment: One beef I have so far if the 100 song limit on playlist.  Really?  Come on,  my heavy metal playlist has over 250 songs. So now I have to split my single playlist into 3...bummer.  I wondered if this was just a limitation of the free version but I didn\'t see any reference to it in the paid version description.    Rock on.
reviews.author: alorr4uz

reviews.title: DRM issue
reviews.comment: Just installed the free version on Samsung S3. Everything works fine, great app & easy to use interface.  But, there\'s 1 major problem: some songs with DRM protection can not be copied even though my songs are all purchased on itunes store! So if this would be a DRM issue why are not all songs blocked? Thanks for reply or fixing this!
reviews.author: Yves K. Dury

reviews.title: Pretty cool app
reviews.comment: A very useful and indispensable app if you have been using an apple device for music and now want to shift to android.  Limitation of 100 songs per playlist can be removed by making multiple playlist (only for syncing part) and then combining it in your player like rocket player
reviews.author: Aditya Kaul

reviews.title: Superb !
reviews.comment: looked for something to replace HTC sync which was a sluggish dogs breakfast but this is easy, fast & did everything I hoped. Thanks.
reviews.author: Eagle Iain

reviews.title: It works !!!
reviews.comment: This just works, superb .. Love it .. So easy to use

reviews.title: Question on reverse syncing
reviews.comment: Does the full version enable the function to reverse sync, as in copying the music files contained in a playlist to a folder on the pc? It does not seem to be working on the free version, and it is something that I would pay for in the full version. Thanks. Also, the music ratings widget does not work on the stock player of my LG Optimus G, only google\'s player.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what the other reviewers are on about. This has been the only app/program I\'ve tried which does the job seamlessly and makes life as easy as it was with an ipod. I\'ve only used it once but I\'d recommend you definitely try it.

reviews.comment: This app really works. Recommend to everyone.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I think it\'s wonderful that I can still use iTunes on my computer and get the same music on my phone. I have to make sure that I make playlists but you have to do the same thing for the iPod shuffle anyhow.
